title: Congressman Joyce on Impeachment Hearings
itunes:title: Congressman Joyce on Impeachment Hearings
description:
Kevin spoke with Wendy Benjaminson, Bloomberg News Politics Editor, and Eli Yokley, Political reporter for Morning Consult. They discussed impeachment hearings, comments from Fed Chair Jerome Powell, trade and USMCA.

Kevin also spoke with Congressman John Joyce, R-PA, member of House Homeland Security and House Small Business, on Impeachment hearings.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
